Title: Follow the poor peasants, roll your body in mud, to temper a red heart
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Sichuan Art Academy (四川美术学院革命委员会供稿)
Notes: The Mao quote on the board reads "Resolute and unafraid of sacrifice, we will surmount every difficulty to win victory" (下定决心，不怕牺牲，排除万难，去争取胜利). The text carved in the mountain is "Agriculture studies Dazhai" (农业学大寨).
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)Quotations from Chairman MaoStudy Dazhai
